xrpl_dex_sdk.utils package¶

Submodules¶

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.conversions module¶

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.conversions.decimal_to_transfer_rate(decimal: float) → Optional[float][source]¶

Converts a decimal to an XRPL transfer rate percentage.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.conversions.server_time_to_posix(server_time: str) → int[source]¶

Parses XRPL server_status response and returns as POSIX timestamp.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.conversions.transfer_rate_to_decimal(rate: int) → Optional[float][source]¶

Converts an XRPL transfer rate from percentage to decimal.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.data module¶

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.data.has_offer_create_flag(flags: int, target_flag: OfferCreateFlags) → bool[source]¶

Returns true if a given OfferCreate flag is present on an Offer.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.data.has_offer_flag(flags: int, target_flag: OfferFlags) → bool[source]¶

Returns true if a given Offer flag is present on an Offer.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.data.omit(d: Dict, keys: Set[str])[source]¶

Omits the contents of the keys set from the dictionary.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.data.sort_by_date(transaction: Dict[str, Any])[source]¶

Sorts Transactions by their dates.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.data.sort_by_previous_txn_lgr_seq(offer: Dict[str, Any])[source]¶

Sorts Offers by their PreviousTxnLgrSeq values.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.errors module¶

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.errors.handle_response_error(error_object: Any)[source]¶

Evaluates a response object and throws any errors found.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.numbers module¶

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.numbers.parse_amount_value(amount: Union[IssuedCurrencyAmount, str]) → Union[float, int][source]¶

Parses an Amount object and returns the value as a number.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.numbers.subtract_amounts(amount: Union[IssuedCurrencyAmount, str], subtractor: Union[IssuedCurrencyAmount, str]) → Union[IssuedCurrencyAmount, str][source]¶

Subtracts one Amount from another, and returns the difference as an Amount.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders module¶

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_amount(source: Union[dict, str]) → Union[IssuedCurrencyAmount, str][source]¶

Creates an Amount from a CurrencyCode and value.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_amount_currency_code(amount: Union[IssuedCurrencyAmount, str]) → CurrencyCode[source]¶

Parses an Amount object and returns the currency code.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_base_amount_key(side: OrderSide) → str[source]¶

Gets the Offer object key of the Offer’s base currency.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_base_and_quote_data(source: Dict[str, Any])[source]¶

Get Base and Quote Currency data.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_book_offer_base_value(book_offer: BookOffer) → float[source]¶

Gets the base currency value from a BookOffer instance.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_book_offer_quote_value(book_offer: BookOffer) → float[source]¶

Gets the quote currency value from a BookOffer instance.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_book_offer_taker_gets(book_offer: BookOffer)[source]¶

Creates a TakerGets object for a book_offers request.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_book_offer_taker_pays(book_offer: BookOffer)[source]¶

Creates a TakerPays object for a book_offers request.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_market_symbol(source: Dict[str, Any])[source]¶

Gets a MarketSymbol from an Offer or Transaction.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_market_symbol_from_amount(base: Union[IssuedCurrencyAmount, str], quote: Union[IssuedCurrencyAmount, str]) → MarketSymbol[source]¶

Gets a MarketSymbol from Base and Quote XRPL Amounts.

Parameters:

  • base (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.Amount) – Base currency as Amount object

  • quote (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.Amount) – Quote currency as Amount object

Returns:

Return type:

xrpl_dex_sdk.models.MarketSymbol

async xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_most_recent_tx(client: AsyncJsonRpcClient, id: OrderId, search_limit: int = 200) → Any[source]¶

Get data for the most recent Transaction to affect an Order.

Parameters:

  • client (xrpl_dex_sdk.clients.AsyncJsonRpcClient) – Client to use when looking up data

  • order_id (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.OrderId) – ID to filter with when parsing

  • search_limit (int) – Max total transactions to search through looking for matching ones

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_offer_from_node(node: dict) → Optional[Offer][source]¶

Returns an Offer object from an AffectedNode.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_offer_from_tx(transaction: Any, overrides: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = {}) → Optional[Offer][source]¶

Returns an Offer Ledger object from a Transaction.

Parameters:

  • transaction (Dict) – Transaction to parse

  • overrides (Dict) – (Optional) Object of values to override transaction defaults with

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_order_fee_from_data(fee_cost: float, source: Dict[str, Any]) → Optional[Fee][source]¶

Get Order fee from source data.

async xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_order_from_data(sdk, input_data: Dict[str, Any], info: dict = {})[source]¶

Parse OrderSourceData into a CCXT Order object.

Parameters:

  • input_data (Dict) – OrderSourceData to parse

  • info (Dict) – Info object with raw exchange responses

Returns:

The parsed Order

Return type:

xrpl_dex_sdk.models.Order

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_order_side_from_flags(flags: int) → OrderSide[source]¶

Parses an Offer’s flags and returns its side (buy or sell).

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_order_time_in_force(input: Dict[str, Any]) → OrderTimeInForce[source]¶

Parses an Order and returns its time in force.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_quote_amount_key(side: OrderSide) → str[source]¶

Gets the Offer object key of the Offer’s quote currency.

async xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_shared_order_data(sdk, source: Dict[str, Any])[source]¶

Get basic Order data.

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_taker_or_maker(side: TradeSide) → TradeTakerOrMaker[source]¶

Gets whether a Trade was from a taker or maker.

async xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.get_trade_from_data(sdk, input_data: Dict[str, Any], info: dict = {})[source]¶

Parse TradeSourceData into a CCXT Trade object.

Parameters:

  • input_data (Dict) – TradeSourceData to parse

  • info (Dict) – Info object with raw exchange responses

Returns:

The parsed Trade

Return type:

xrpl_dex_sdk.models.Trade

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.parse_affected_node(affected_node: dict, entry_type: Optional[LedgerEntryTypes] = LedgerEntryTypes.Offer) → Optional[Node][source]¶

Parses a Node and returns its data in an agnostic format.

Parameters:

  • affected_node (Dict) – Node object to parse

  • entry_type (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.LedgerEntryType) – LedgerEntry type to filter by (defaults to Offer)

Returns:

The parsed Node, or None if unable to parse.

Return type:

xrpl_dex_sdk.models.Node

xrpl_dex_sdk.utils.orders.parse_transaction(id: OrderId, transaction: Any) → Optional[Dict[str, Any]][source]¶

Parse any Transaction and return data relevant to creating an Order/Trade.

Parameters:

  • order_id (xrpl_dex_sdk.models.OrderId) – ID to filter with when parsing

  • transaction (Dict) – Transaction data to parse
